comment: Ugh.  After only sleeping 7 hours (8 with nap) yesterday, I thought I'd enjoy less sleep last night
Nope, needed 9, and still slightly tired due to crap sleep quality :ptv-unimpressed:
New Comic Page: Overpowering Desperation http://twokinds.keenspot.com/comic/1079/
New Patreon Post: Kat and Nora - Love Talk 2 https://www.patreon.com/posts/kat-and-nora-2-30236100
That emote must get so much mileage
Two things dragons are looking for: entertainment and power. Checks out.
The fact that Trace seems to be filthy rich doesn't hurt too, I assume.
Money doesn't matter at all to a dragon
So, dragons in Twokinds don't hoard valuable stuffs?
I think this just doesn’t make sense. When you are a powerful dragon you can get things without money.
You reminded me of one of my ideas. I wanted to suggest the idea of ​​human stereotypes about dragons. Something like that:
Nora found a new place for her cave.But after a while, she was disturbed by the villagers who brought the virgin as a sacrifice to the bloodthirsty dragon.
Nora: Seriously? Virgin?! What will I do with her? Maybe at least gold or a cow?
Shaman: No! Elder books say that exactly virgins must be sacrificed to dragons.
Nora: Hey! I am dragon! I know better what will be better for me.
I guess, if there are spells and magics that allow item creation, then Dragons have no need for valuables.
turns out the real hoard was the dragons we befriended on the way
I think they can collect them ... as a hobby. https://cs11.pikabu.ru/post_img/big/2018/12/29/8/1546091995150821751.png
For example, Reni collects magical things.
I just imagined Nora having a cave full of replicas of interesting beings she has met during her lifetime.
Cave... that's a bit stereotypical. Lair, maybe.
Narrator: "Nora was able to acquire many things during her life.  However, there was one thing she wanted above all else, but could never have..."
...Is there a translation for that comic?
Ask Illiar for a translation. Or try inputting that stuff manually into google translate
It seem the speechless version is missing.
Yay, successful google translate of first bubble
"Wow... I didn’t think you could have such a ...interesting... ...hobby ..."
Courier: Oh. I did not think that you have such... an interesting... hobby.
Dragon: This is instinct. It is impossible to resist your nature.
Dragon: And now put this limited edition figurine and don’t touch anything.
I was just about to post something similar :P
